course.title: The Bird Conspiracy: Are They Real?
course.description: Explore the controversial theory that birds are not what they seem. This course investigates the possibility of a government cover-up involving our feathered friends. It includes a video lecture and a quiz to test your understanding of the claims.

questions.question: What is the primary claim presented in the video?
options: Birds are ordinary animals with no hidden agenda
Birds are solely responsible for pollination

questions.question: According to the theory, what is the alleged purpose of these modified birds?
options: To spread seeds and aid in growth
